website_summaries.verdict: A standard accessory set that helps you easily increase the ways you can use your Instant Pot.
pros: Includes a steamer basket, springform pan, egg bites mold, oven mitts, egg steaming rack, dish clip, tongs, whisk, rack trivet, silicone mat, basting brush, and magnets with food cooking times and temps
Steamer basket has silicone legs for extra stability
cons: The egg molds are a bit small and won't hold an entire egg

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a variety of average items
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits my 6 qt. Instant Pot. Cooking guides are vague. The handle to the egg bites mold is malformed. Unsure if it will hold up under pressure when the mold is lifted out of the cooker. The handle for the steamer basket gets lost inside the basket instead of sitting on the top edge of the basket. The remaining items seem to be in good shape but I have not used them all yet.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great value for some awesome accessories
customer_reviews.text: I was just gifted an Instant Pot and I went looking for just a steamer basket for it when I found this accessory package. Not only is the strainer for steaming a good size, the number and quality of other items you get from this bundle is fantastic! I can't wait to try everything out. I love that it includes some other useful utensils like a mini whisk and tongs, and the little magnetic cheat sheets will be super helpful while I'm learning how to use my IP. I haven't had time to use everything yet, but they all seem sturdy and good quality. You really can't beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: MMkay13

customer_reviews.title: What the hell
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m not one to leave bad reviews but on top of the package being two days late, I’m pretty sure in the title it says that it’s a 28 piece accessory kit for $40. I received 4 accessories of 28. I’m honestly expecting a refund at this point they can have their “ accessories“ back.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: A great accessory package for instant pot users v
customer_reviews.text: I got this because as I was using my instant pot more and more I discovered I really needed some accessories. For instance I had no pan that would fit in the instant pot when I was making a frittata, and used a bowl I was worried would crack with the heat. It didn’t , but I feel much safer using the springform pan. Also, the egg cups were a big selling point for me. They are so handy for egg muffins and many other things. A couple of things there I did not need, but will likely use at some point. Overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had my instantpot for a while now, but haven't done some of the more exciting recipes I've seen in facebook groups yet. But now that I bough these accessories, I can! I have an 8qt instantpot and these fit perfectly and are so handy. So far I've used the egg molds and made egg salad and the mitts are way more helpful than I thought. I'm definitely expanding my skills with these! I was impressed with the quality and materials. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MSJFL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful collection for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful collection of accessories for my Instant Pot. Many multiple uses for some items. Look well made. Many I suggest since they are shipped in the original retail box that the lid be taped shut. I appreciate the additional USB drive with multiple cook books for Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Deem

customer_reviews.title: These products have made my instant pot experience more versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I use the steamer basket for veggies and potatoes. The egg bites mold for eggs and muffins. But the bottom of the sling failed to stay in place. It should have a better attachment point. I always use the silicone mitts to remove the pot liner from the instant pot. The food tongs and whisk are cute! The dish clip is good for lifting anything out of the instant pot. The trivet is better than the trivet that came with the instant pot. It's wider so it doesn't move as much. The egg steamer rack is good for putting pots on. I like the easy reference magnets for commonly cooked items. That is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great set of accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this set long but it's a really good buy. I'm using the IP almost every day so this set will get a workout. My fav pieces are the egg bites and steamer basket but the mitts and mat are used a lot too. I haven't used the dish clip but I'm sure it will work fine. It's good to receive a set where everything is useful and works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Pamala A.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This kit is ideal for someone wanting to expand the use of their pressure cooker. The steamer basket is very convenient and fast to steam veggies or meat. I like the egg bites mold most. I used it to make some chocolate puddings. The mitts and dish clip are very useful, I steam my food in a flat dish pretty often, the dish clip is so helpful. All the tools are all good quality, definitely worth your penny.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am a new Instantpot user, but am SO HAPPY that I got these accessories to go with it! I can see that I will be using all of them regularly. I am especially excited for the egg bite molds! I made them yesterday and they are VERY CLOSE to the Starbucks egg bites. I was able to customize them though so that they are healthier! I can't wait to see what else I can do! Additionally, the tongs have been great for shredded chicken and the mits are a MUST for getting things out of the InstantPot! Seriously a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylea

customer_reviews.title: Good bundle, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with all of the accessories you would need, and some you don’t, but the price is hard to beat and the finish quality of the items is good. I’ve used the steamer basket and egg rack multiple times since getting this and they work perfectly. Not sure how often I’ll use the other items but I bought it primarily for those two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about Instant Pot Accessories
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence about buying these Instant Pot accessories, I strongly advise you to make the purchase. I use many of the accessories daily, and not just for the Instant Pot. Since it is summertime, I use the steamer to make wonderful corn on the cob. The pinchy potholder replacement thingys are preferable to actual potholders. I am looking forward to making a cake in the Instant Pot using the device in the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Quality 7" spring form pan plus
customer_reviews.text: YXWIN 15 pc. Instant Pot Accessories set. I purchased this set because i wanted to do cheesecakes in my pressure/slow cooker (not an Intant Pot brand) I needed to purchase a 7" pan in order to fit inside the cooker. The spring form pan that can with this is order is high quality and the other accessories will be put to good use with my other pressure cooker and pans.
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: What a Value for the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely a necessity for Pressure cooker use. I had a steamer rack but this one is so much better than the one i had. I've done dozens of eggs with out an egg holder but have really enjoyed the holder. I have used everything in the set and love it all.. Highly recommend for personal use and as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: tlr8259

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used any of the items in this package but the trivet, which I like a lot. It protects my counter top from the heat of the instant pot. I am looking forward to using the cake pan and the egg steamer rack. The silicone mitts are nice. I will update this review as I use the other items
customer_reviews.author: millshouse

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Instant Pot  Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in one package. Wisk, check! Steamer basket, check! Everything is high quality and shipped quickly. Make hard boiled eggs or poached eggs or even individual quiche. One of the neatest things is the silicone mitts - the food gets hot in the instant pot. Use the mitts to take out baked potatoes or other hot foods. Great accessories I wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Revision - Seller Reached Out to Resolve Issue
customer_reviews.text: - Used my spring form pan for the first time tonight for Valentine's day cheesecake. it came out GREAT, EXCEPT the non stick black coating was peeling off!! See the pix. This is after the 1st use!!! Not happy. *****UPDATED: The seller reached out to me to fix this problem. They were glad for the feedback as they have changed to another manufacturer! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca g.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your handy Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when my accessory kit arrived. It was like Christmas morning for me! Everything was packaged very well- nothing was damaged. I haven’t utilized all of the accessories yet, but am very pleased with the quality. The silicone mitts are, hands down my favorite! This set is a must have for any Instant Pot user.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot extras
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of extras for my instant pot. I needed something to steam veggies with. I'm totally going to try the egg rack and the little egg bite thing. I might even try to make a cake. The only negative thing I can say is that some of the extras, like the tongs and silicone mits, are a little small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for many accessories
customer_reviews.text: Many of these products can be used for a multitude of things which is great when you don't have a lot of space for kitchen accessories. The silicone oven grabbers and pot holders work very nicely. The silicone egg mold is really cool too, you can make simple eggs so you don't have to peel them or even bake in them or make cake bites! The spring form cake mold is a little small but works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brita

customer_reviews.title: It fits my Instant Pot and expands its uses!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it took me so long to get an instant pot. These accessories have made it easier to expand its uses. The only thing I got that I don't know how to use is how to download the recipe e book card. Everything came as described and I am happy with the products.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice additional to my new Instant Pot....only thing disappointing is the bogus "USB" Recipe Card > What is this? No instructions. There's no way this can connect to an MAC ! Fix the "free Recipe" download and get rid of the tiny cupcake cups!
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, well-made kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set for the 6 qrt Instant Pot! Every piece is well made and sturdy. I've seen some of the multi-piece kits that were poor quality and wasn't sure what to expect with this one but I have been very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really ordered this for the steaming basket, but this came with A LOT!!! There are sooo many things we can now make with these accessories, including cake! Amazing!!! It also comes with handy fridge magnets letting you know how long things need to cook!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This set includes EVERYTHING you need and everything you didn't know you needed. The springform pan is great to bake cake for 2-4 people in minutes! The trivet with the handles is perfect to place egg mold, springform pan, and plates on top of. Silicone mitts are very helpful , I use them to take plates out of microwaver and oven every day. Seller provide the ebook link to us for download. This is really good. If you use your IP, these items will expand your culinary skill. High quality, All pieces are sturdy and clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: S S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I second what other reviewers have said, except that apparently they listened to the negative feedback about the handle for the egg bites mold. Mine was perfectly fine. I am so excited to have these "extras" to be able to, more easily, create amazing meals and treats in my Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.author: Momma P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot must have
customer_reviews.text: All items as described. Very compact box containing everything. Good quality, useful addition to the very versatile instant pot. I love the whole set up and this accessories set is a must have. Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Love the many different accessories. The steamer/colander is very sturdy. It's stainless steel, so it can go in dishwasher. The dish clip is amazing. I've been using it every day. No more burning my fingers taking things out of the microwave. All the silicon pieces are easy to clean.the magnets will be a big help for an instapot newbie. My only complaint is that the springform pan started to rust on the inner seams after 1 wash, and it is a bit hard to reassemble
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because we needed a steamer rack with raised handles for lifting food out of the insert pan, but when I saw this set with so many different pieces and priced under $30, I couldn’t pass it up. I haven’t used it all yet, just the silicone mitts, the egg trivet, and steamer rack. So far, I’m very pleased with the quality. I have a 6 qt instant pot and everything fits perfectly. I’m excited to have so many helpful accessories. This is a must have for anyone who owns and uses an instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Tuft

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for instant pot
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set for your instant pot. Comes with all the different accessories you might need for a great price. All the accessories seem to be a decent quality. Love the magnets with the cook times.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Must have accessories for the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This accessory kit has made cooking in the Instant Pot much easier. I used the egg tray to make hard-boiled eggs and they came out perfect! I have also used the cake insert and made blackberry cobbler and corn bread. Making desserts or bread in this tray was nice because you can loosen the sides to drop the cake out. The accessories and the steamer basket make available more cooking options with the Instant Pot. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: IP Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I love the set of IP accessories. I've used the egg bite tray and love it. I can't wait to use the spring release for yummy cheesecake or the steam basket for fresh veggies. I'm very pleased with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Ables

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So I have had these for several months now, and I absolutely love them! Now I haven’t used everything yet, but here are reviews for what I have used: 1) the rings are so cute, but one side of the tops always comes off when washing. 2) the egg molds are amazing and I love to use them, but it can be difficult to clean-now in previous reviews I had read that the handles “sucked” however I have no issues with them! 3) the tony mittens to grab the hot items are so cute and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A practical set of accessories with many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with so many useful items! I haven’t used them all yet, but so far I’m really enjoying these Instant Pot accessories. It even comes with some magnets displaying common cooking times and methods, which fit perfectly on the Instant Pot itself. A very useful set of items!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These suck they rust after one use and the springform pan coating stated to peel after one use and rust was everywhere on it as it air dryed.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Buyer 85

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 qt instapot and these accessories are amazing! I was looking for a springform pan that would fit my pot and found this kit and love all the extras. The silicon mits are lifesavers for pulling a hot rack out, no more tongs! But the included tongs would work as well. The magnetic cheat sheets are actually really cool and came in handy several times the first time I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeTucker

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.  Do your research.
customer_reviews.text: Exchanged for product with more every day useful product at better value
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for the number of accessories that are included.
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty incredible deal for all of the many accessories that were included, better than I had hoped for. The quality of the products seem good and look like they should hold up pretty well. I had particularly wanted the steamer basket, but was very happy with the number of other items that came with it. Some I'll use frequently, others maybe not quite as much. But all will be useful and I'm sure that I'll find a use for them. I'm very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: ooooooommmmmmmggggggg This set is absolutely perfect I love every piece and have so many ideas for each piece. If I had one complaint it would be that I wish the strainer had 3 different department to steam multiple things.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary McLarty

customer_reviews.title: Your Instant Pot needs these accessories to look pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Instant Pot and I didn't think it could get any better until I found these awesome accessories. The sky is the limit with the potential creativity. They come exactly as listed. My favorite is the special spring form pan so I can make vegan gluten free cheesecake. Then second is the silicone egg cooker. I plan on making turkey bacon and green chile eggs for the fourth of July.
customer_reviews.author: Jandeck

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use with my new Instant Pot. The price was great and the product good quality. I have boiled eggs and used the grippers. I cant wait to use the cake pan to make a cheese cake.
customer_reviews.author: Jess30

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend buying this product. There are so many useful items in this box...it will definitely make my instant pot more efficient. I cannot wait to try to make desserts & lasagna using the springform pan. I have been wanting one of those for quite a while. I love to steam veggies in my instant pot & the basket is perfect for that. I cannot say enough about how pleased I am with this set.
customer_reviews.author: John F Woodley

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality of products for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used the egg bite mold and steamer rack trivet to make cornbread bites and I did not have any issues with the product and it was easy to clean. The magnets with recommended cooking times are neat and are currently on my fridge as they serve as an awesome quick reference. I can't wait to use the other accessories as they seem like good quality. I have recommended this product to friends and family with the instant pot
customer_reviews.author: Marisha

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Before I looked on amazon, I checked kohls online. For just one Item in this package was $15. So this was a great deal. My wife wanted the springform pan so I got this combo set for her and she loves it. Love the quick reference fridge magnets. We haven't had a chance to use everything in the combo package, but it all looks to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought my Instant Pot so I am still a newbie but I was thrilled to find this accessory pack for such a great price. These accessories will make it possible to cook so many more things.
customer_reviews.author: SaraLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving my accessories set that I received for my instant pot! It arrived earlier than anticipated which is always a bonus! I’m excited to use the steamer basket and the egg bite mold the most. I love to food prep and these accessories will definitely make my life easier — saving me time and dirty dishes! The fridge magnets are great as well so I don’t have to refer back to my instant pot paperwork when I cook!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Young

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone who uses an Instapot!! I was really pleased with all of the accessories it came with. It’s great also bc they all stack up inside each other so they don’t take up a lot of room in the cabinets. If I was to buy all of these accessories separately, it would have cost much more. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I use every item in this kit very frequently. My favorite is the egg holder for hard-boiled and the sous vide one too. All of the products are really good quality and making using the instant pot so much fun since you are able to make over 500+ recipes with the accessories. If you have an instant pot or are getting one, you definitely need to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this assortment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly for the mesh basket. I am very pleased with all of the items that came with the set and feel it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this accessory set after receiving an Instant Pot for Christmas. I am on the Keto diet and knew that I needed some additional products in order to do all my cooking. This product has every accessory that I need in order to do all my cooking. Everything is as it appears in the listing and is a great item for the cost! I would highly recommend this to any Instant Pot owner!
customer_reviews.author: Jrbarnett89

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: If you love your instant pot these tools are a must! The instant pot is so versatile. Roast? Yup! Hard boiled eggs? Yup! Steamed veggies? Yup! Egg bites? Yup! Cheesecake? Yup! Anything you can cook on stove top or oven cooks quicker in the instant pot. No hot kitchens, no standing and stirring. Get yourself one, you deserve it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Warren

customer_reviews.title: So many great accessories
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how many great accessories fit into this box. I thought the steamer basket and the spring form pan were fantastic and just what I was looking for. I like that the egg bites silicone mold has a lid. I will say that some of the items were very small such as the food tongs, whisk and basting brush but are still usable. Overall I think was a great value when you price out each item.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: My box was not complete... Fixed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: this company is great!!! They got right on the issue and replaced everything!! Great items Great service!! These pieces were missing from my box: Food Tongs, Dish Clip, Silicone Mitts, Whisk, and the Silicone Basting Brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much cool stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read what came with the kit, I was still pleasantly surprised at just how much came with it. I can’t wait to try some recipes in which I bought the kit for.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia shryock

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product has so many good quality pieces included in one great price. I would recommend this product to any Instant Pot owner. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: DanVin

customer_reviews.title: Useful Accessories and Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Great number of accessories to use with new Instant Pot. Excited about the Silicone Egg Bite form. Good price. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great set don’t overthink this one just get it
customer_reviews.text: I have just got this but used the steamer basket and egg tray already. They both worked perfectly and appear well made. I am excited to try a cheesecake in the springform pan. It is a great set! Please get this so you can enjoy it over the holidays too.
customer_reviews.author: Love my boxers

customer_reviews.title: E-Book Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I like my pressure cooker accessory kit. I have not used any of the accessories yet. I just received it yesterday. However I was not impressed with the e-book recipes. No instructions with the card. The product information on the Amazon site states that the card is to be inserted into your PC. Its the size of a credit card. I am not sure how they expect you to insert it into your PC.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Renaue

customer_reviews.title: Question
customer_reviews.text: Nice accessories but I don't know what to do with this thing that was included. It says it has an ebook on it but I don't know how to read it. It doesn't fit USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Ijw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the options and that these accessories allow me to use my instant pot. I have baked brownies, cooked perfect eggs, and even made tamales!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Nelezen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a steal!
customer_reviews.text: This accessory kit goes above and beyond. I was very impressed with the quality and how many accessories came with the kit. They work great with our 6qt instapot. Definitely a great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Big Things Come in Little Packages
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It's amazing how many accessories fit in that little box. This set should be mandatory for any Instant Pot lover. Your options are endless now with the steamer basket, Springform pan, and silicone egg bites mold. You can steam vegetables and fish, make cakes or casseroles, brownie bites, egg bites, muffins, hard boiled eggs, etc. Highly recommended! Can't wait to experiment with some new recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Kuschel

customer_reviews.title: Love all the types of things in this kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love the egg piece the best! I haven’t used all the pieces yet, but everything I’ve used is just so perfect for the instant pot. With a family of 5 and lots of different dinner times during the evening, the instant pot and these accessories have eased the stress as a stay at home mama.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Freeby

customer_reviews.title: Alot in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I received this from my husband for christmas. I mostly wanted this for the steamer basket and egg bites mold. Cant believe how much is packed in this box. The egg holder is nice as now my yolks are all in the same place vs using the trivet. Egg bites mold is nice-- 3 eggs with toppings I have found will fill 6 of the molds. I do wish this had an extra ring as we do a mix of sweet and savory recipes
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fox

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This product contains so many great gadget for the Instant Pot. My favorites pieces are the egg trivet for making egg bites and the basket for steaming veggies. This is the gift that keeps on giving - includes a code for a free e-cook book too. Lots of fun pieces in this.
customer_reviews.author: cardine

customer_reviews.title: Takes your instapot to the next level!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely so happy with my purchase great quality easy to use the steamer basket is bomb.com everything just amazing takes my instapot to the next level highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine kammeyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and I love each of these accessories. It has made my cooking experience so much easier, especially in the morning. Definitely recommend this product. The reason I gave 4 starts is because when I received the package, it was opened and did not look like it was a brand new box.
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchaser

customer_reviews.title: So excited to use all my new accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great price. I've just started using the instant pot regularly and these accessories are a great add on and add some convenient new ways to use the pot. I've already used the steam rack to cook eggs and the mitts and trivet are a nice quality. Oh the magnets are an added bonus and stuck them right on the sides of my pot!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Meucci

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant at first
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I first opened the box because some of the items seemed so small. However when looking at instant pot recipes like for say cheesecake, they mostly called for a 7 inch so I guess it's the correct size. I have an 8 qt so I might go ahead and get a bigger springform pan. They are easy to clean and so far everything has worked well and for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very nice qaulty but came missing the baking sheet and cupcake molds. Amazon gave me a partial refund per my request. The qaulity of what I did receive I am very pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: betsy negley

customer_reviews.title: These accessories are a must-have!!
customer_reviews.text: We thoroughly enjoy these accessories for our Instant-Pot. We've already used 3/4 of them. Good quality, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin T

customer_reviews.title: A large piece of it was broken
customer_reviews.text: I unwrapped the box today in order to wash and use them and I found that the strainer is broken. And it doesn’t come with the things picture on the box
customer_reviews.author: chare'e marniece

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Just received this yesterday. Everything in it looks great. My daughter in law just got one and told me to purchase. Can't wait to use it. Came with a lot of great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Great Accessories

customer_reviews.title: An essential kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. I wasn't sure if I needed this and was hesitant to purchase it. I'm so glad I did. I've made egg bites, pancake bites, a cheesecake, and hard boiled eggs so far. I love the quick guide magnet set. The silicon pot holders were worth the price alone. Go for it, you won't regret the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lindsey Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: We have the crockpot version of the instapot and this fits perfectly. This set has everything you need, the quality is great, and the price was not too high. As soon as it came in we immediately made cheesecake and it was one of the best cheesecakes we have made!

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with quality, exactly as described.

product_meta.title: Upgraded 28pcs Accessories for Instant Pot Compatible with Pressure Cooker 5,6,8 Qt, Includes Steamer Basket, Springform Pan, Non-Stick Silicone Egg Bites Mold, Baking Mat,12 Baking Cup(Ebook RECIPES)
product_meta.description:
28 pieces Instant pot Accessories package contents:
1x Stainless Steel Steamer Basket
1x Non-stick Springform Pan
1x Silicone Egg Bites Mold
1x Silicone Baking Mat
12x Silicone Reusable Baking Cup
2x Silicone Mitts
1x Stainless Steel Steamer Rack Trivet
1x Multi-purpose Steamer Rack
1x Dish Clip
1x Kitchen Tongs
1x Stainless Steel Whisk
3x Magnetic Cheat Sheets
1x Silicone Trivet Mat
1x Silicone Basting Brush
1x Manual ( Provides the download address for Ebook Recipes)
feature_bullets: High Value One-stop Accessories kit: Complete set of 28-pcs Insta Pot accessory would meet all your needs on Instapot & Pressure Cooker and save you 50% money at least. This set includes 1 Stainless Steel Steamer Basket, 1 non-stick Springform Pan, 1 silicone Egg Bites Mold, 2 Silicone mini Mitts, 1 Egg Steaming Rack Stand, 1 Dish Clip, 1 Steamer Rack Trivet,1 Food Tongs, 1 Whisk, 1 Silicone Heat Resistant Mat, 3 Magnetic Cheat Sheets, 1 silicone baking mat, and 12 reusable baking cup...

Versatility &Great Helper in Kitchen: Premium Steamer Basket is used to steam veggies, meat, seafood and other food. Its feet keep the food out of the liquid for optimal steaming results, or as a strainer to wash vegetables. Heat resistant silicone mitts are quite flexible and convenient to wear on & off. The egg bites mold is so versatile,it can be used for making egg bites, muffins, ice cubes, store baby food etc. It's the most popular one in those pressure cooker accessories

Easy & Healthier Cooking Method: After you using Springform Pan to make cheesecake or bread pudding in your insta-pot, you won't to return to oven again. Steamer Rack is not only for steam eggs, also allow you cook different foods at the same time. This handy cookware accessories can let your pressure cooker & IP be more versatile. It can greatly save your time to cook fast for a several people's dinner. Steaming is a healthier cooking method, cook low calorie food and keep 90% nutrient

Food Grade Material 100% Certificated Quality: Safety and Eco-friendly is our first priority. All products meet US Food-Grade Standards, made of premium 304 stainless steel and silicone, and BPA FREE. Sturdy and durable stainless steel products were built to last long, no rust forever. Silicone material is flexible, heat resistant and easy to clean. Our pressure cooker accessories set is dishwasher safe, and easy to store

Best Gifts for All Occasions& Bonus E-Books: YXWIN 28pcs insta pot accessories set is great for 6 quart IP, most brands of electric pressure cookers & many purposes in kitchen. Perfect gifts for housewarming, birthday, Mother Day, Christmas, or anniversaries. We provide eBook which includes more than 500 Recipes to download. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. 12 Months Warranty makes your purchase absolutely risk-free
